and projectName like concat('%',#{searchkeyword},'%') and institutionName like concat('%',#{searchkeyword},'%')
and projectState ="bg-primary" and projectState ="bg-warning" and projectState ="bg-danger" and projectState ="bg-success"
order by (case projectState when "bg-danger" then 1 when "bg-warning" then 2 when "bg-primary" then 3 when "bg-success" then 4 end ) limit #{currentpageDB},#{paging}
